value.title: Filter top 3 products with a row for others using DAX in Power BI
value.excerpt: This video shows an optimized DAX technique to display the first N products for each category in Power BI, adding a row that aggregates the value for all the other products. Article and download: https://sql.bi/695263/?aff=yt  The article includes further insights and optimization solutions, whereas

value.title: Lookup multiple values in DAX
